html:
4.21.25  9:39 pm   How do you feel about scrambled eggs? 

      very difficult to unscramble

4.21.25  9:35 pm   have you found any good or effective ways to deal with fomo (fear of missing out)? 

     maybe you can go ahead and partake for a little while

4.21.25  8:02 pm   if santa claus is jesus, as credibly stated in your hit track 'christmas isn't real',

     songs are not 'credible statements'. they are for fun and intrigue

     what is the tooth fairy?

      might be your mom

4.21.25  7:45 pm   is the united states just a really successful spinoff of great britain

      i never thought of it that way

4.21.25  7:16 pm   do you like heavy metal music?

      i don't see why not

4.21.25  7:15 pm   Hey, do you know how to uhh, bounce a ball?

      i know how to denounce a ball, is that good enough

4.21.25  7:14 pm   Tell us a secret

      telling secrets destroys the secret

4.21.25  7:12 pm   How do I know if my singing is actually good or if I'm under an illusion from practicing so much?

      if you sing a lot you will probably get good. practicing a lot may sometimes give you the illusion that you are lousy because you are sick of yourself, but if you take a break and come back you will notice results

4.21.25  7:02 pm   What books have been the most influential on your approach to composition? (If any)

      none. reading your question carefully, i believe this is an acceptable answer

4.21.25  6:26 pm   Would you like to be te next pope?

      maybe a couple of popes from now

4.21.25  5:55 pm   bill did you remember to pick up your Easter basket

      i don't have an easter basket

4.21.25  3:35 pm   when was the last time you weren't what you once were?

      just moments ago

4.21.25  3:22 pm   being a longtime fan of yours, i've always noticed when someone asks something about wanting to do something the way you do it, you always say something about how it's too time consuming or just not worth it, why do you do it the way you do it when you don't agree with the way you do it?

      maybe there's something wrong with me

4.21.25  3:16 pm   do you have an explanation for the fact that the english word "tar" is such a superb word despite being very simple and the meaning being something pretty unappealing

      no, but furthermore not everyone likes it the way you do. i don't have an explanation for that either

4.21.25  2:20 pm   how many restaurants do you think are actually a different restaurant? like, let's say you're driving along, lo de da de doo, minding your own business, and, you're about to get to the restaurant and then you're there and bam! it's a different restaurant. forever, it's been. like, it changed, but it already had changed. like a long time ago. like a bait-and-switch. how often do you think that happens?

      doesn't happen. restaurants are themselves. that's one of the amazing things about the restaurant business. restaurant permanence

4.21.25  2:04 pm   singing into a pillow should let me hit high notes without being too loud right

      i think so

4.21.25  12:45 pm   if i eat a sandwich will i gain 300 health

      that all depends on what the maximum health is

4.21.25  11:34 am   what's your favorite recipe

      making patterns and breaking them

4.21.25  11:19 am   Why is it so difficult for people to consider the possibility that life may be pointless?

      remind me again what you mean by 'point'

4.21.25  10:51 am   i get unhappy when an article consists entirely of talking about what things there are to talk about, instead of just talking about them

      they're just trying to buy some time for you to accidently click something

4.21.25  10:39 am   Will you heed the call of Cthulhu?

      i actually don't know how to heed something. i don't know what 'heed' means

4.21.25  10:24 am   do you think the content of dreams should be taken seriously

      in some ways

4.21.25  9:22 am   How bad is Leroy Brown?

      actually pretty good

4.21.25  8:42 am   tea with sugar or without

      that's none of my business

4.21.25  5:43 am   what's the most convenient thing to ever happen

      the big bang

4.21.25  4:51 am   how do you come up with your ideas

      they're just right there

4.21.25  4:17 am   soooooo are we ready to be the newest pope or what?

      for some reason i've never noticed any difference in their governing style

4.21.25  4:07 am   Jezus wat is chocola toch lekker

      vind ik ook, hoor

4.21.25  4:06 am   i am enjoying the nhl playoffs

      that's fair

4.21.25  3:54 am   What is the best joke you ever heard?

      nice trip, see you next fall

4.21.25  3:35 am   do people change?

      sure, and stay the same

4.21.25  3:22 am   hi bill, thanks for inspiring me with my creative projects. i'm planning a synesthesia-driven motion graphics music video project, translating a jazz track into visuals. i was wondering if you have had associations with chords/notes with different colors, instruments with shapes, or textures with chord quality/type that you've formed from your experience with making highly edited music videos.

     i have not. for me what counts is the sum total of what's going on

      a second opinion about this is one that I'm curious about, would be really great if you're able to answer this.

4.21.25  2:09 am   what are some of the landmarks in The Land Of The Two-Letter Words, as referenced in your hit song might quit (2019)

      the words themselves, and how they are arranged rhythmically and melodically, in the line immediately following

4.21.25  2:02 am   how do we get rich and not be sad?

      i'm not sure

4.21.25  12:04 am   Was Christopher colombus chinese

      i have no idea

4.21.25  12:00 am   I think when I *think* about having fun, and all the fun I *think* I'll have, I usually end up not having a lot of fun. When I actually find myself having the most fun is when I don't think about anything. Like.... I just find myself having fun?
I just.... do the thing that's fun? Somehow? Automatically? Naturally?
Sometimes I think thinking isn't always the best idea I think it is.

      thinking.... can't live with it can't live without it

4.20.25  11:38 pm   what's nine plus ten?

      eight plus eleven

4.20.25  9:33 pm   is there such a thing as trying too hard

      sure, especially when there is a correct designated amount to try

4.20.25  9:20 pm   help i can't find my last easter egg. i dyed actual eggs. there is an egg somewhere in my house. if i don't find it soon it will stink and get dye everywhere. WHAT DO I DO?

      learn next time for the egg hider to keep a master list of all the locations

4.20.25  8:53 pm   Meow

      thank you for saying meow. i appreciate that

4.20.25  7:34 pm   I got an otamatone for easter

      oh good, now everyone has one. you were the last person who didn't have one

4.20.25  6:23 pm   whats is the point of questions if they're gonna be answered

      remind me again what a 'point' is

4.20.25  6:17 pm   I really want to make music but I can't stop doubting myself or thinking no one is going to like it and those feelings hold me back quite a bit, how does one deal with that

      music needs to feel loved. music is hesitating to visit you right now because it doesn't want to feel like you're only doing it to make other people like you. the music needs to really feel like you actually love it when it's there

4.20.25  2:30 pm   Does nature do something for you or is it just sort of there

      'nature'...... technically, means everything

4.20.25  2:18 pm   Opinion on puns?

      very effective, in moderation

4.20.25  12:41 pm   Do you ever think about the sky

      yes

4.20.25  11:50 am   What are some fun stuff to do outside alone on a sunny day?? 

      maybe circumnavigate the globe

4.20.25  11:17 am   is jazz jazzy or is there a better adjective for it

      forget it, those are just words

4.20.25  11:17 am   do you have a favorite parable

      no, but i tend to make my own

4.20.25  9:57 am   I know how to make "music" but how the hell do I actually write melodies and lyrics and put together nice chords and how do I arrange it all so it sounds like a "piece"

      when you change position in bed, how do you know what the right position is? i don't know the answer to this, but it's the exact same answer
